creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
description: tan/orange body; disc shape with a wide, round body, no neck; round mouth; ring with short perpendicular lines around mouth with four small designs attached; wide dark line around that with 8 panels with geometric designs below on top of widest part of body; no design below widest part of body
signed: on bottom: [Deborah Clashin 2015 (with a smoking pipe design)]
title: Vessel
